name: tdrgtps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, ctrg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopDRing, c0 ∈ TopSp, c0 ∈ TopRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctdrg), wcel(c0, ctps))

⊢ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopDRing → c0 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopSp)

comment: A topological division ring is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
